title: Strengthening Curriculum Development Practical Competencies: Nursing Practicum Assessment Failure Management Training Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Nursing Theory and Clinical Practice Experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can explain strategies for maintaining assessment fairness and professionalism by analyzing practical assessment failure cases
Learners can categorize at least three failure-influencing factors, such as organizational culture and assessor support systems
Learners can simulate practical assessment failure scenarios using effective communication strategies with students

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
